Evanston IL January 2005 to Present As Director of Digital Design I successfully established a framework for software development at the Bahai National Center in the United States By creating an measured against primary goals and initiatives Based on these inputs it becomes possible to abstract designs for product designs that can be articulated into tactical plans for production I have
